Memory Game

Welcome to the Memory Game! Test your memory and concentration skills with this fun and challenging game. The objective is simple: match pairs of cards with the same picture to clear the board.

Controls:

Start: Click the "Start" button to begin the game.

Restart: Click the "Restart" button to reset the game and start over.

Timer: Keep an eye on the timer to track your progress.
